title: Who do you think the weakest assassin is!? ~ Poll S-Z
body:
Vote as a community.

Champions 30/30 

Continue though the vote list via these links:
A-K: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/onQ34IuY-who-do-you-think-the-weakest-assassin-is-poll-a-k 
___
L-R: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/A8MwRmaT-who-do-you-think-the-weakest-assassin-is-poll-l-s

replies.body: Do you even know what an assassin is?
I think this includes secondary role as assassin too

Implying what Riot says is accurate, if that were the case recommended builds by that logic would be amazing which they are not they're pretty bad actually, many of these champs i would never consider to be an assassin.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Assassin_champion

sorry for any 'inconvenience' but I just used a wiki list, I know they can be pretty in accurate, but I was in a rush.
Teemo, Tryndamere, Vayne, Vi, Xerath and Yasuo are not assassins.
depends on the build, I was also too lazy to sift through the list sorry I was in a rush http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Assassin_champion

Akali, Diana, Elise (kind of), evelyn, fiora, fizz, kassadin, Katarina, Khazix, leblanc, lee sin (kind of), Mustard yi, Nidalee, nocturne, Pantheon, Poppy, rengar, Riven, Shaco, Talon, Wukong (kind of), zed.

Those are the assasins.

Worthy mentions to twitch, tryndamere, twisted fate, vi, and teemo.
